attributes.additional_details: The Falkland Islands (Islas Malvinas) was fought for in 1982 by our brave servicemen and women against Argentina, With 2,000 Inhabitants and with one capital city thriving with a school, cathedral, public house and with a port and airfield. More towns, villages and eventually cities can be developed on these islands, The islands use the pound as their currency and has a time zone of GMT -4, Because of other several differences on these beautiful isles, We should honour it's beauty, people and land by Independence as it's own Republic State.
